dict.acceptation: 照明，照明设备；点火；舞台灯光；布光，灯光安排；

sent.orig: This is the standard Transform &Lighting (T&L) pipeline, where the functionality is essentially fixed.
sent.trans: 这是标准的变换与光照(Lighting)管道线，在那，函数本质上是不变的。

sent.orig: Industrial and commercial lighting, lighting household lighting stores, schools, hospitals, building lighting etc.
sent.trans: 工业照明、商业照明、家居照明、医院、商场、学校等建筑照明。

sent.orig: Traffic lighting, flood lighting, industrial lighting, for plant growth.
sent.trans: 交通道路照明，泛光照明，工业照明，植物生长照明。

sent.orig: LED out door lighting, advertising lighting, decorative lighting, LED display, etc.
sent.trans: LED室外照明，广告照明，装饰照明，LED显示屏等数十个品种及相关配件。

sent.orig: Our product have Moving head,outdoor lighting,LED lighting,DMX Controller,Gobo lighting etc.
sent.trans: 我们的产品有摇头灯、户外照明、LED系列、控台、电脑图案灯等等。
